title: A Practical Introduction to Regression Discontinuity Designs: Extensions
abstract: arXiv:2301.08958v2 Announce Type: replace-cross  Abstract: This monograph, together with its accompanying first part Cattaneo, Idrobo and Titiunik (2020), collects and expands the instructional materials we prepared for more than $50$ short courses and workshops on Regression Discontinuity (RD) methodology that we taught between 2014 and 2023. In this second monograph, we discuss several topics in RD methodology that build on and extend the analysis of RD designs introduced in Cattaneo, Idrobo and Titiunik (2020). Our first goal is to present an alternative RD conceptual framework based on local randomization ideas. This methodological approach can be useful in RD designs with discretely-valued scores, and can also be used more broadly as a complement to the continuity-based approach in other settings. Then, employing both continuity-based and local randomization approaches, we extend the canonical Sharp RD design in multiple directions: fuzzy RD designs, RD designs with discrete score

translated_title: 《回归断点设计实践导论：拓展篇》
translated_abstract: 这篇专著连同其伴随的第一部分 Cattaneo, Idrobo 和 Titiunik (2020) 汇编和扩展了我们为 2014 年至 2023 年间讲授的50多个关于回归断点(RD)方法论的短期课程和工作坊准备的教学材料。在本第二部专著中，我们讨论了几个在 RD 方法论中建立在和扩展自 Cattaneo, Idrobo 和 Titiunik (2020) 中引入的 RD 设计分析基础之上的主题。我们的第一个目标是提出一个基于局部随机化思想的替代 RD 概念框架。这种方法论方法对于具有离散分值得分的 RD 设计可能有用，并且在其他环境中也可以作为连续性方法的补充更广泛地使用。然后，应用连续性和局部随机化方法，我们在多个方向上拓展了标准的 Sharp RD 设计：模糊 RD 设计，含离散分数的 RD 设计。
tldr: 提出局部随机化思想作为替代回归断点概念框架，并在多个方向上拓展了标准的Sharp RD设计。
